thread.title: Horoscope for Saturday, 10/10/15 by Christopher Renstrom
thread.title_full: Horoscope for Saturday, 10/10/15 by Christopher Renstrom - SFGate

author: sfgate.com
title: Horoscope for Saturday, 10/10/15 by Christopher Renstrom
text:
ARIES. (March 20 - April 19): You're standing at a crossroads, but if you take the best that both choices have to offer then you can turn it into the life path for you.
TAURUS. (April 20 - May 20): Pass on the offer that's on the table because you don't want to sign on for anything where someone else has complete say. A golden cage is still a cage.
GEMINI. (May 21 - June 20): Intervene before a co-worker makes an enormous mistake. His misreading of the situation could wind up costing you big time.
CANCER. (June 21 - July 21): Someone who did you wrong wants to make amends. You don't have to be friends, but accepting this person's apology would be a good idea.
LEO. (July 22 - Aug. 22): You've no choice but to act in blind faith. There's no other way to get from here to where you want to go so do what you think is best.
VIRGO. (Aug. 23 - Sept. 22): Jupiter brings a sense of higher purpose and its trine to Pluto today shows that you'll soon understand the hidden meaning behind recent events.
LIBRA. (Sept. 23 - Oct. 22): It's not like you to go back on your word, but now that you know what you know - it's really for the best. You need to protect your interests.
SCORPIO. (Oct. 23 - Nov. 21): This is a prosperous time for a friend. Stand close and maybe some of that good fortune will rub off on you.
SAGITTARIUS. (Nov. 22 - Dec. 20): Set your sights higher than you ever have before. You stand a good chance of taking in a hefty haul.
CAPRICORN. (Dec. 21 - Jan. 19): Benevolent Jupiter trines Pluto in your sign. You've gone through hell; now you can reap some of the benefits of heaven.
AQUARIUS. (Jan. 20 - Feb. 17): You can't do people's emotional homework for them. This is something you will have to accept today when you decide to give a pass or failing grade to a certain relationship.
PISCES. (Feb. 18 - March 19): People are willing to do all sorts of favors for you thanks to the Jupiter/Pluto trine. Don't hold back with the requests. You never know when the planets will look this good again.
